SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:title: Smart turn off
SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:summary: Uses light sensor present on the bulb to automatically turn off lights when enough natural light is entering the room. This setting is independent of automatic brightness setting.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Night Light
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Lower exposure to blue light before going to bed increases sleeping time by 1 hour.
